name: Yolanda Brown
what_you_do: Yolanda Brown is a content strategist and copywriter who helps entrepreneurs and creative artists amplify their authentic messages and optimize human experience through compelling content.
who_you_serve: Entrepreneurs, creative artists, and thought leaders dedicated to creating an optimal human experience.
seeking: Partnerships with HumanLifeOptimizers™ - those building sustainable communities, food systems, and green/renewable energy solutions.
offering: Crafting strategic, repurposed content that frees clients to focus on their unique genius while amplifying their authentic impact.
signature_programs: Content Leftovers™ - a content repurposing program
business_focus: Helping HumanLifeOptimizers™ amplify their authentic messages and optimize human experience through compelling, repurposed content.
